summary: Technology is increasingly automating tasks usually performed by people. Although data doesn't explicitly identify workers at risk of losing their jobs, it offers insight into skills needed for jobs that are projected to be in-demand. Some workforce training programs focus on resume writing and interviewing skills and getting a job quickly, even if it pays little. But many stakeholders said the programs also need to...
title: Workforce Automation: Insights into Skills and Training Programs for Impacted Workers
